215 лет ветеринарному образованию России: 215 years of veterinary education in Russia
№1 в рейтинге агентства RAEX в сфере “Ве: No. 1 in the RAEX agency rating in the field of “Veterinary and Animal Science”
Санкт-Петербургский государственный унив: Saint Petersburg State University of Veterinary Medicine —
старейшее учебное заведение и родина выс: the oldest educational institution and the birthplace of higher veterinary education in Russia, with more than 200 years of history
Сложившиеся в течение столетий научно-пе: The university's scientific and pedagogical schools, developed over centuries, and its personnel potential are aimed at solving state tasks to provide the country with highly qualified specialists. The university employs a team of scientists recognized not only in Russia, but also abroad.
Более 80% профессорско-преподавательског: More than 80% of the teaching staff have academic degrees and titles. Currently, almost 3,000 undergraduate and graduate students are studying at the university’s 4 faculties and 23 departments.
центром ветеринарного образования России: center of veterinary education of Russia
создавать научные прорывы для практическ: create scientific breakthroughs for practical application in society, protect animal health to ensure a sustainable environment, and train professionals who can work effectively and successfully in a rapidly changing technological world”
